casebody.data:
Floyd PRYER, Sr. et al.
v.
OUR LADY OF THE LAKE HOSPITAL, INC., et al. NO. 2018-CC-1577 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 14, 2019 ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE 19TH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF EAST BATON ROUGE Writ denied. HUGHES, J., would grant for reasons assigned by Judge Holdridge. CRICHTON, J., additionally concurs and assigns reasons. Crichton, J., additionally concurs and assigns reasons. I agree with the denial of this writ application. I write separately to note that, because the evidentiary issues presented here are uniquely complicated, in my view the trial court should provide the jury with specific caution on how to receive and evaluate the evidence presented.
